pros: MRHC IS A GREAT PLACE TO WORK!  Staff is friend and caring.  Dedicated to providing excellent patient care.  Recent adjustment to wages enabled this organization to be competitive.  Outstanding physicians who work well with staff and are patient-centered.  Great benefits and have given employees increases while other organizations have struggled.  Committed to preventing staff reductions.  We are a family.  We celebrate the accomplishments of co-workers and share their pain whether personal or professional.
cons: Sometimes as employees we are ungrateful for the great work environment and benefits we have.

pros: good benefits, state retirement, good PTO,  small work environment so every one knows everyone, made life long friendships
cons: management is terrible, it is a completely different place to work in a worse way from when I started 8 years ago, the organization does not care about their employees, only had 3 raises in 8 years which were deemed cost of living of about $0.30 per raise, very little career advancement, a lot of politics within the hospital
